00070     void Alignment::ForwardRecursionGotoh(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00071         const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM, ScoreMatrix* D,
00072         ScoreMatrix* P, ScoreMatrix* Q)
00073       {
00074         double gapOpenP;
00075         double gapExtendP;
00076         double gapOpenQ;
00077         double gapExtendQ;
00078         double diagScore;
00079 
00080         //Forward
00081         for (uint i=1; i<A->size()+1; i++)
00082           for (uint j=1; j<B->size()+1; j++)
00083             {
00084               //Score of Match eg. Mismatch
00085               diagScore = D->at(i-1).at(j-1) + scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1), B->getChar(j
00086                   -1));
00087 
00088               //Score of Open Gap in A
00089               gapOpenP = D->at(i-1).at(j) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1))
00090                   + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00091               //Score of continue Gap in A
00092               gapExtendP = P->at(i-1).at(j)+ scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00093 
00094               //Score of Open Gap in B
00095               gapOpenQ = D->at(i).at(j-1) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1))
00096                   + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00097               //Score of continue Gap in B
00098               gapExtendQ = Q->at(i).at(j-1) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00099 
00100               //Set Helper Matrices Values
00101               P->at(i).at(j) = scoreM->BestOfTwo(gapOpenP, gapExtendP);
00102               Q->at(i).at(j) = scoreM->BestOfTwo(gapOpenQ, gapExtendQ);
00103 
00104               //Set Distance Matrix Value
00105               D->at(i).at(j) = scoreM->BestOfThree(diagScore, P->at(i).at(j), Q->at(i).at(j) );
00106 
00107             }
00108       }
00109 
00110     Alignment* Alignment::BacktrackingGotoh(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00111         const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM,
00112         const ScoreMatrix* D, const ScoreMatrix* P, const ScoreMatrix* Q)
00113       {
00114 
00115         int i = D->size()-1;
00116         int j = D->at(0).size()-1;
00117         double minScore = D->at(i).at(j);
00118 
00119         Alignment* out = new Alignment(A->getAlphabet());
00120 
00121         vector<int> outA;
00122         vector<int>::iterator itA = outA.begin();
00123         vector<int> outB;
00124         vector<int>::iterator itB = outB.begin();
00125 
00126         minScore = matrix->SearchMinimumPosition(D, i, j, minScore, scoreM);
00127 
00128         //        minScore = std::min(D->at(matrix->SearchMinimuminlastColumn(D)).at(j), std::min(P->at(matrix->SearchMinimuminlastColumn(P)).at(j), Q->at(matrix->SearchMinimuminlastColumn(Q)).at(j) ));
00129 
00130         //        std::cout << "Gefunden in: " << i << ":" << j << " Wert=" << minScore
00131         //            << std::endl;
00132 
00133 
00134 
00135         while ( (i>0) && (j>0))
00136           {
00137             //            std::cout << "Aktuelle Score: " << minScore << std::endl;
00138 
00139             //Change to Q
00140             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(D->at(i).at(j), Q->at(i).at(j) ) == Q->at(i).at(j))
00141               {
00142 
00143                 //Lonely Gap in A
00144                 if (Q->at(i).at(j) == D->at(i).at(j-1) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i -1))
00145                     + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1)))
00146                   {
00147                     minScore =+scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1));
00148                     //                                        std::cout << "Left"<< endl;
00149                   }
00150                 //Continued Gap in A
00151                 else if (Q->at(i).at(j) == Q->at(i).at(j-1) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1)))
00152                   {
00153                     //                                        std::cout << "Left cont "<< endl;
00154                   }
00155                 else
00156                   {
00157                     //                    std::cout << "Changed to Q but not possible?" << std::endl;
00158                   }
00159                 itA = outA.insert(itA, -1);
00160                 itB = outB.insert(itB, B->getValue(j-1));
00161                 j--;
00162                 minScore =+scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00163                 continue;
00164               }
00165 
00166             //Change to P
00167             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(D->at(i).at(j) , P->at(i).at(j) ) == P->at(i).at(j))
00168               {
00169                 //Lonely Gap in B
00170                 if (P->at(i).at(j) == D->at(i-1).at(j) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1))
00171                     + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1)))
00172                   {
00173                     //                                        std::cout << "Up"<< endl;
00174                     minScore =+scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1));
00175 
00176                   }
00177                 //Continued Gap in B
00178                 else if (P->at(i).at(j) == P->at(i-1).at(j) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j -1)))
00179                   {
00180                     //                                        std::cout << "Up cont"<< endl;
00181                   }
00182                 else
00183                   {
00184                     //                    std::cout << "Changed to P but not possible?" << std::endl;
00185                   }
00186                 minScore =+scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00187                 itA = outA.insert(itA, A->getValue(i-1));
00188                 itB = outB.insert(itB, -1);
00189                 i--;
00190                 continue;
00191 
00192               }
00193 
00194             //Diagonal
00195             else if (D->at(i).at(j) == D->at(i-1).at(j-1)
00196                 + scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1), B->getChar(j-1)))
00197               {
00198                 minScore =+scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1), B->getChar(j-1));
00199                 //                                std::cout << "Diag"<< endl;
00200                 itA = outA.insert(itA, A->getValue(i-1));
00201                 itB = outB.insert(itB, B->getValue(j-1));
00202                 i--;
00203                 j--;
00204                 continue;
00205               }
00206 
00207             else
00208               {
00209 
00210                 std::cout << "42!!!"<< std::endl;
00211                 break;
00212               }
00213 
00214           }
00215 
00216 //                while (i > 0)
00217 //          {
00218 //            //            std::cout << "Overlapp A"<< endl;
00219 //
00220 //            if (i == 1)
00221 //              minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1));
00222 //            minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00223 //            itA = outA.insert(itA, A->getValue(i-1));
00224 //            itB = outB.insert(itB, -1);
00225 //            i--;
00226 //          }
00227 //
00228 //        while (j > 0)
00229 //          {
00230 //            //            std::cout << "Overlapp B"<< endl;
00231 //            if (j == 1)
00232 //              minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1));
00233 //            minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00234 //            itB = outB.insert(itB, B->getValue(j-1));
00235 //            itA = outA.insert(itA, -1);
00236 //            j--;
00237 //          }
00238 
00239         A = new bpp::Sequence(A->getName(),outA,A->getAlphabet());
00240         B = new bpp::Sequence(B->getName(),outB,B->getAlphabet());
00241 
00242         //Save Score to Container
00243         out->set_score(minScore);
00244         
00245         //Constify the Sequences
00246         A = const_cast<bpp::Sequence*>(A);
00247         B = const_cast<bpp::Sequence*>(B);
00248 
00249         //Add Alinged Sequences to Container
00250         out->addSequence(*A);
00251         out->addSequence(*B);
00252 
00253         return out;
00254       }

00256     void Alignment::ForwardRecursionNMW(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00257         const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM, ScoreMatrix* D)
00258       {
00259         double gapOpenP;
00260         double gapOpenQ;
00261         double diagScore;
00262 
00263         //Forward
00264         for (uint i=1; i<A->size()+1; i++)
00265           for (uint j=1; j<B->size()+1; j++)
00266             {
00267               //Score of Match eg. Mismatch
00268               diagScore = D->at(i-1).at(j-1) + scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1), B->getChar(j
00269                   -1));
00270 
00271               //Score of Open Gap in A
00272               gapOpenP = D->at(i-1).at(j) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1))
00273                   + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00274 
00275               //Score of Open Gap in B
00276               gapOpenQ = D->at(i).at(j-1) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1))
00277                   + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00278 
00279               //Set Distance Matrix Value
00280               D->at(i).at(j) = scoreM->BestOfThree(diagScore, gapOpenP, gapOpenQ);
00281 
00282             }
00283       }
00284     Alignment* Alignment::BacktrackingNMW(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00285         const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM, const ScoreMatrix* D)
00286       {
00287 
00288         int i = D->size()-1;
00289         int j = D->at(0).size()-1;
00290         Alignment* out = new Alignment(A->getAlphabet());
00291 
00292         vector<int> outA;
00293         vector<int>::iterator itA = outA.begin();
00294         vector<int> outB;
00295         vector<int>::iterator itB = outB.begin();
00296 
00297         double minScore = double(0);
00298 
00299         /*
00300          //Search minimum Score in last row
00301          for (uint k=1; k<=A->size(); k++)
00302          {
00303 
00304          if (T[k][B->size()] < minScore)
00305          {
00306          i = k;
00307          j = B->size();
00308          minScore = T[i][j];
00309          }
00310          }
00311 
00312          //Search minimum Score in last column    
00313          for (uint k=1; k<=B->size(); k++)
00314          {
00315          if (T[A->size()][k] < minScore)
00316          {
00317          i = A->size();
00318          j = k;
00319          minScore = T[i][j];
00320          }
00321          }
00322 
00323          std::cout << "Gefunden in: "<< i << ":"<< j << " Wert: "<< T[i][j]<< endl;
00324          */
00325 
00326         double ScoreD;
00327         double ScoreDiag;
00328         double ScoreUpD;
00329         double ScoreLeftD;
00330 
00331         while ( (i>0) && (j>0))
00332           {
00333             ScoreD = D->at(i).at(j);
00334             ScoreDiag = D->at(i-1).at(j-1);
00335             ScoreLeftD = D->at(i).at(j-1);
00336             ScoreUpD = D->at(i-1).at(j);
00337 
00338             //Lonely Gap in A
00339             if (ScoreD == ScoreLeftD + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i -1))
00340                 + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1)))
00341               {
00342                 //std::cout << "Left"<< endl;
00343                 minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1));
00344                 minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00345                 itA = outA.insert(itA, -1);
00346                 itB = outB.insert(itB, B->getValue(j-1));
00347                 j--;
00348               }
00349 
00350             //Lonely Gap in B
00351             else if (ScoreD == ScoreUpD
00352                 + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1))
00353                 + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1)))
00354               {
00355                 //std::cout << "Up"<< endl;
00356                 minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1));
00357                 minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00358                 itA = outA.insert(itA, A->getValue(i-1));
00359                 itB = outB.insert(itB, -1);
00360                 i--;
00361               }
00362             //Diagonal
00363             else if (ScoreD == ScoreDiag + scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1),
00364                 B->getChar(j-1)))
00365               {
00366                 minScore += scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1), B->getChar(j-1));
00367                 //std::cout << "Diag"<< endl;
00368                 itA = outA.insert(itA, A->getValue(i-1));
00369                 itB = outB.insert(itB, B->getValue(j-1));
00370                 i--;
00371                 j--;
00372               }
00373 
00374             else
00375               {
00376                 std::cout << "42!!! Lost in D"<< endl;
00377               }
00378 
00379           }
00380 
00381         while (i > 0)
00382           {
00383             //std::cout << "Overlapp A"<< endl;
00384             minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1));
00385             itA = outA.insert(itA, A->getValue(i-1));
00386             itB = outB.insert(itB, -1);
00387             i--;
00388           }
00389 
00390         while (j > 0)
00391           {
00392             //std::cout << "Overlapp B"<< endl;
00393             minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1));
00394             itB = outB.insert(itB, B->getValue(j-1));
00395             itA = outA.insert(itA, -1);
00396             j--;
00397           }
00398 
00399         //Save Score to Container
00400         out->set_score(minScore);
00401 
00402         A = new bpp::Sequence(A->getName(),outA,A->getAlphabet());
00403         B = new bpp::Sequence(B->getName(),outB,B->getAlphabet());
00404 
00405         //Constify the Sequences
00406         A = const_cast<bpp::Sequence*>(A);
00407         B = const_cast<bpp::Sequence*>(B);
00408 
00409         //Add Alinged Sequences to Container
00410         out->addSequence(*A);
00411         out->addSequence(*B);
00412 
00413         return out;
00414       }

00416     Alignment* Alignment::NeedlemanWunschAlignment(const bpp::Sequence* inA,
00417         const bpp::Sequence* inB, const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00418       {
00419         ScoreMatrix D =
00420             matrix->InitializeScoreMatrixDistances(inA, inB, scoreM);
00421 
00422         //Forward Iteration
00423         ForwardRecursionNMW(inA, inB, scoreM, &D);
00424 
00425         return BacktrackingNMW(inA, inB, scoreM, &D);
00426 
00427       }
00428 
00429     Alignment* Alignment::GotohAlignment(const bpp::Sequence* inA,
00430         const bpp::Sequence* inB, const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00431       {
00432 
00433         ScoreMatrix D = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(inA, inB, 0);
00434         ScoreMatrix P = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(inA, inB, 0);
00435         ScoreMatrix Q = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(inA, inB, 0);
00436 
00437         //Forward Iteration
00438         ForwardRecursionGotoh(inA, inB, scoreM, &D, &P, &Q);
00439 
00440         return BacktrackingGotoh(inA, inB, scoreM, &D, &P, &Q);
00441 
00442       }
